text: Ezɨ Devit kamaghɨn uan ingangarir gumazir dapanir Jerusalemɨn itibav gɨa ghaze, “Aria, ia dɨkavigh e zuamɨram Jerusalem ategh areka. Puvatɨghtɨ, Apsalom e mɨsueghtɨ e bar arɨghiregham. E zuamɨram areka, e suighsuightɨma, Apsalom uan adarazi ko izɨ en nguibar ekiam gasɨghasɨgh, en gumazamizibav sueghtɨ me arɨghiregham.”
